text: *idea*: pay for slack, some tricks and snippet we drop in any channel are already lost because of the limit of history :slightly_smiling_face:
I agree and this would be really cool but I have a feeling paying $6.67 per month per active user might be more than they wanna pay.
lol, didn't knew it was so expensive...
yea, wish they had a pricing plan that made more sense for this kinda slack
what about a bot that saves the history somewhere else? :thinking_face:
That could be useful. lotta work but probably useful
you could have it set up so that only things that get starred by certain users get exported

idea- whenever possible please communicate to the user if they don’t have the permissions to do something when they try to do it. 

Example: I can’t create a HubDB table, I can view the list of them but the button to create is disabled, there’s no explanation that I don’t have permissions.
